text: Blue Valentine is a 2010 movie. It is a romantic drama starring Michelle Williams and Ryan Gosling. The original rating of this movie was NC-17, but the rating was successfully appealed to an R rating. The movie is about a married couple who are shifting back and forth, along with their eventual divorce. Category:2010 romantic drama movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:American independent movies
title: Blue Valentine (movie)
